content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 inspired by the norwegian fir 1 cardigan pattern by oge knitwear designs we ve developed a sweet coordinating baby blanket featuring an all-over lace pattern framed with a border of easy garter stitch petits pins was designed with artfil aran a heavenly soft 4-ply pure merino wool that is machine washable for worry-free care
